title: Acrobat Error
content:
Anybody know why Acrobat gave me this error while attempting to create a multi-page PDF from multiple InDesign files?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019053001im_/http:/typophile.com/files/error_4323.jpg)
author: jayyy

comments.content: Were you trying to drop several InD files onto Acrobat? What were you doing exactly when you got this error?
